name: Dynamic Shift
description:
DYNAMIC SHIFT! Is a speed platformer with transformation based combo building particle spewing music hype bloom intensifying action! created for Weekly Game Jam 160 with the theme "Nothing Stays Forever". Controls are WASD to move, 1-6 to change form, or click the buttons, or press Q and E to cycle through them. Whatever floats your boat! On easy difficulty the obstacles will be the same color as the form you need to clear them, on medium they each have a reasonable unique color, and on hard they are the same color as everything else, also the world will fall apart really fast.

Credits:

Programming - Tyler Smith (@loadsofmana), 

Art - Damien Flores, Tyler Smith

Music - Dekkanoid

SFX and Voices - Tyler Smith, Damien Flores
